original_text: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.
korean_text: 각각 은사를 받은 대로 하나님의 여러 가지 은혜를 맡은 선한 청지기 같이 서로 봉사하라

sentences.original_text: As every man hath received the gift
even so minister the same one to another
as good stewards of the manifold grace of God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 여러 가지 은혜의 좋은 청지기로서
